name: Wayne's World 3 (7dfps)
description:
You can use WASD to move, turn with Q & E, and interact with F. If you have a weapon, you can attack with R (or space bar, but I can't promise that won't scroll your stupid browser window). Gamepad also supported.

Made for 7dfps in Construct 3 with some art assets by Luke Humphris and a BGM track by Andrew de Koning. Voices were generated in 15.ai.

Chrome is recommended, as that was where I did most of my testing. I won't have time to fix everything, at least not during 7dfps. But drop me a line if it's totally unplayable -- or if you enjoy it.
